Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or supporting information to prove that the people being arrested in the video are related to the implementation of the National Register of Citizens (NRC) in Assam.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video is from Assam after the implementation of the NRC, without providing any concrete evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The video is actually from Hyderabad and shows CAA and NRC protestors being detained at Exhibition Grounds, Nampally. This alternative explanation contradicts the claim that the video is from Assam after the NRC implementation.
